title: Divya Kanthi Haaram - A Symphony of Emerald, Ruby & Diamond Splendor

The intricately designed pendant showcases a vibrant Emerald at its heart, surrounded by delicate CZ settings and interspersed with Rubies. The necklace chain features a delicate floral design, each petal encrusted with sparkling CZs. Features a classic 'Lakshmi Kasu' design inspiration. Beautifully crafted golden beads dangle from the pendant, adding a touch of playful elegance. The piece is finished with a signature Hyderabadi polish, ensuring a lasting luster and durability.
